locations.title: Savers - Draper
locations.description:
Savers is a chain of for-profit thrift stores accepting and reselling donated items from non-profit organizations. They also work with waste management companies for responsible disposal of items that cannot be recycled.

They accept a wide range of donations including garments, accessories, shoes, sports equipment, textiles, appliances, toys, games, houseware, jewelry, media, small furniture, and more.
locations.address: 1166 Draper Pkwy, Draper, UT 84020, USA

locations.title: Salvation Army - Salt Lake City
locations.description:
The Salvation Army was founded in London in 1865. Since then it has grown into a global charitable organization, currently serving in 130 countries.

Financial donations are more than welcome, but they also accept goods such as clothing, houseware, home appliances, furniture, and others. If you're not sure whether they can accept your donation, please give them a call beforehand.
locations.address: 252 S 500 E, Salt Lake City, UT 84102, USA

locations.title: Big Brothers Big Sisters - American Fork
locations.description:
Founded in 1904, Big Brothers Big Sisters' mission is to provide children with adult mentors, helping guide them through the many obstacles of life.

Donations accepted include financial contributions, as well as other items through many of their locations you see below. If you're not sure whether your donation will be accepted, please give them a call beforehand.
locations.address: 135 E Main St, American Fork, UT 84003, USA
